title: KPU and audio record incompatibility
body:
Hi I'm doing a project about sound recognition.
I use the FFT functions used in it's demo scripts to get an image and upload it to a MobileNet model I've made and tested, both codes work in separate but when I joined them, the board just crashes without any error message (sometimes it shows something like 0;33mW...).

I've tried to debug the problem and I realized that the lines of code below are the problem when they're in the same script.
`audio = rx.record(sample_points)`
`fmap = kpu.forward(task, imgout)`

So I there is some type of incompatibility when recording audio and sending an image to the kpu.

PS. I've tried the function `audio = rx.wait_record()` to try and stop recording so that I can send the image to the model but the problem persists.
I'm using the MaixPy Dock board, I also tried with the Maixpy Go and the most recent firmware versions
When I run the script on the terminal after transfering it to the board returns this error message:
“W (129088164430) SYSCALL: sys_exit called by core 0 with 0x1”

Please any help is appreciated I'm on a time schedule to deliver the project
